text: Tunisia competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Open water swimming== Tunisia qualified one male open water swimmer. ;Men {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%;" |- !Athlete !Event !Time !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Oussama Mellouli |align=left|Men's 10 km |1:50:21.0 |38 |} ==References== World Aquatics Championships Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships 2019
title: Tunisia at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
